my_subscriber.cpp
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 //Subsciber Node that accepts processed image from publisher
2 
3 #include <ros/ros.h>
4 #include <image_transport/image_transport.h>
5 #include <opencv2/highgui/highgui.hpp>
6 #include <cv_bridge/cv_bridge.h>
7 
8 void imageCallback(const sensor_msgs::ImageConstPtr& msg)
9 {
10  try
11  {
12  cv::imshow("view", cv_bridge::toCvShare(msg, "bgr8")->image);
13  cv::waitKey(30);
14  }
15  catch (cv_bridge::Exception& e)
16  {
17  ROS_ERROR("Could not convert from '%s' to 'bgr8'.", msg->encoding.c_str());
18  }
19 }
20 
21 int main(int argc, char **argv)
22 {
23  ros::init(argc, argv, "image_listener");
24  ros::NodeHandle nh;
25  cv::namedWindow("view");
26  cv::startWindowThread();
27  image_transport::ImageTransport it(nh);
28  image_transport::Subscriber sub = it.subscribe("camera/image", 1, imageCallback);
29  ros::spin();
30  cv::destroyWindow("view");
31 }
